greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: First differences of A257512: a(n) = A257512(n+1) - A257512(n).
comment: It seems that for all n >= 1, Sum_{k=1 .. 2^n} a(k) = 2^(n+3) - 1 = A000225(n+3).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..16384
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, May 03 2015
